title: Tweet This!
shortDescription: Let users tweet about your content.
longDescription:
Tweet This! is an app that allows visitors to tweet text content on your webpage simply by highlighting it.
You can optionally add your twitter handle and website URL to the tweet as well.
instructions: Select text on your site and the Tweet This balloon will appear!
author: Twitter Inc.

categories.title: Get More Customers
categories.description: Apps to help you grow your customer base.

categories.title: Add-ons
categories.description: Drop-in components to add to your website.

categories.title: Recommended for Blogs
categories.description: Apps for blogs in the recommendation engine.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

categories.title: Social Media
categories.description: Integrate your website with Twitter, Facebook, and other networks.

type.title: Choose a URL to add to the tweet

enabled.title: Add your username to the visitor's tweet.
